title: A Qualitative Data Analysis Chat with Beth Duckles

yaml.title: A Qualitative Data Analysis Chat with Beth Duckles
yaml.description: A casual conversation with Beth Duckles, PhD to discuss qualitative data analysis

markdown.markdown:
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

**Date: April 8, 2022**\
**Time: 11:00-11:50am PT** (UTC-7)\
**Where: Zoom**\
**Free event, [registration through eventbrite](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/openscapes-community-call-qualitative-data-analysis-chat-with-beth-duckles-tickets-300170978477) **
<!---[**Video Recording**]() --->

Please join us for a conversation with [Beth Duckles, PhD](https://bethduckles.com/), a research consultant and social scientist who helps technologists, designers and scientists gather and use human-centered data. We'll discuss qualitative data analysis - what it is and how it can be used for evaluation. 


```{r, out.width="45%", fig.align='center', preview=TRUE}
knitr::include_graphics("duckles.jpg")  
```
